#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,p,i,k;
		char s[5];
		vector<ll> v;
		cin>>n>>s>>p;
		if(s[0]=='o')
		{
			for(i=2;i<=n;i+=2)
			{
				v.push_back(i);
			}
			cout<<v[p-1]<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			for(i=1;i<=n;i+=2)
			{
				v.push_back(i);
			}
			cout<<v[p-1]<<endl;
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
